events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review it shortly to determine next steps.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your experience with software development and devops practices.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering recruitment has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background, experience with software engineering, and your interest in this position.
Thank you for your quick response to the screening questions and providing further details on your devops experience and technical skills.
We have scheduled your technical interview with the engineering team for May 21st to further assess your software development capabilities.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in software architecture and devops tools.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 24th to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps in the hiring process.
The HR interview went well, and the team was impressed by your alignment with our company values and your enthusiasm for the role.
An official offer has been proposed to you, including details about compensation, benefits, and onboarding timeline.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your excitement to join our engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer to join as a Software Engineer, and we are excited to have you onboard.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to tools, training sessions, and introductions to the engineering team.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully as you have fully joined the company and begun your role as a Software Engineer.
